Game of Toast Semester 1, 2020

21/07/2020

Hello Friends!

Now that Covid has gone and the University has stopped being a big nerd, we're meeting on campus again!
Zoom wasn't a hit. Turns out you can't really practice public speaking from your bedroom. One slightly interesting thing that happened was that we had a guest join us from London. No idea why.
Join us in the OGGB, room 260-205 from 6-8pm for some jolly good fun.
